column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aang says : " You trained the Dai Li ?
#Text=I had no idea what they would become .
#Text=Aang , our actions always have an effect : sometimes positive , sometimes negative ... and sometimes not for many lifetimes .
#Text=Hurry !
#Text=You must find the Waterbender Avatar who came before me .
#Text=" Aang says : " But I do n't even know his name !
#Text=" Kyoshi says : " His name is Avatar Kuruk .
#Text=" Aang says : " We 're in the Realm of Koh , Hei Bai ... We better be careful .
#Text=Aaahh !
#Text=Koh took your face and replaced it with a bear 's face !
#Text=" Kuruk says : " Relax kid .
#Text=I 'm not going to hurt you .
#Text=I 'm Avatar Kuruk !
#Text=Nice to finally meet you .
#Text=Now tell me , have you seen a beautiful woman with long , brown hair around here ?
#Text=" Aang says : " No , who is she ?
#Text=" Kuruk says : " She 's my wife .
#Text=When I was a young Avatar ... ... I traveled the world , challenging other benders to tests of strength ... " Kuruk says : " I challenge you to an Agni Kai !
#Text=" Fire Nation civilian says : " Uh , I was just going to the store .
#Text="
